name: Solvek
content:
Solvek was a male Ubese, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Solvek worked as a bounty hunter and once had a falling out with the Hutt crime lord Draba, resulting in her attempting to feed him to a nexu. Solvek escaped and later tried to take an assignment from Governor Zerex of the planet Ord Adinorr. However, Zerex was an associate of Draba and when he learned of her grudge against Solvek, he had the bounty hunter arrested and sent to the Spice Mines of Kessel.
A group of agents who Solvek had previously had a disagreement with were later imprisoned with him on Kessel, so he sent a some thugs to attack them.
